name: Ketapel Buah
description: Fruit Puzzle Bobble: shoot and match fruit bubbles to clear the wall before it reaches the bottom.

name: Hantu Smash
description: Tap the right button to smash the ghost. With increasing difficulty and speed, players must act fast to score points before time runs out. Are you up for the ghostly challenge?

name: Kelilingan
description: Get ready to flip and score big! Our new game challenges you to flip wooden dolls across a variety of vehicles for maximum points. How far can you go?

name: Tanggar Leak
description: Jump on the platforms to get higher and higher and earn more points! Watch out for the Leak monster lurking below. Quick reflexes are needed to outmaneuver the beast and reach the end goal. Can you reach the highest score?

name: Bikkelen
description: Aim, shoot, score! Our new game combines the thrill of basketball with the fun of pinball. Get ready for an action-packed challenge full of obstacles and big scores.

name: Dikejar Ondel
description: Select card as soon as possible to get a luck card to avoid ondel ondel theft!

name: Bayar Utang
description: Help the characters cross the roads of Jakarta and get to the bank to pay their debts. Watch out for the menacing vehicles!

name: Scare The Crow
description: Help the characters cross the roads of Jakarta and get to the bank to pay their debts. Watch out for the menacing vehicles!

name: [AR Game] Germa Shoot
description: Clean the germs in your room by shooting them with a soap gun and get as much score as you can!

name: [AR Game] Feed The Orangutan
description: Aim, shoot, score! Feed the Orangutan all the good fruits and get the highest score in this unique Augmented Reality game.

name: Pusmeng
description: Test your reflexes as you jump and slide through the obstacles! Careful not to get caught!

name: Panen Jagung
description: Harvest all the corn but watch out for those pesky rats!

name: Icip-Icip
description: Put all the skewers on to the grill and make sure they don't overlap

name: Mancing Yuk
description: Be the number 1 fisherman in this multiplayer game! The player with the most fish caught wins the game.

name: Flip The Bottle
description: Inspired from the viral internet challenge, flip the bottle until the end of the level!
